question: Where was Micah from (Mic 1:1)?

choice: The high places of the earth

they will be ground to dust

choice: Like a bear having lost her cubs

choice: Their protection is taken from them

question: Micah tells Adullam to make themselves as bald as a(n) __________ (Mic 1:16)

question: What will be established in the last days (Mic 4:1)?
choice: The mountain of the Lord’s temple

question: What will happen when the mountain of the Lord’s temple is raised above the hills (Mic 4:1)?
choice: All the world will bow before it
The Lord will descend with a shout
The glorious cloud will abide there

question: What will many nations say (Mic 4:2)?

Let us rest In the presence of the Lord

To gather with the saints of Israel

To the house of the God of Jacob

question: What will go out from Zion (Mic 4:2)?

choice: He will lead them into the city

question: In the last days what will the nations do with their swords (Mic 4:3)?
choice: Turn them over to the Lord

question: In the last days what will the nations do with their spears (Mic 4:3)?
choice: Use them to defend the poor

question: In the last days what will nations not do any longer (Mic 4:3)?

choice: In the presence of the Lord

choice: In the presence of the Lord

No one will make them afraid

choice: In the name of their gods
In the way of the wicked

question: In what will “we” walk in the last days (Mic 4:5)?

choice: Those who he had brought to grief

question: What will the Daughter of Zion do with the wealth of the nations (Mic 4:13)?
